Positive.3: The place is cute and the staff was very friendly. Nice menu. Good for brunch.

Positive.35: The manager noticed and got me my check and packed my leftovers asap.
Positive.37: The server couldn't have been more attentive and friendly.
Positive.51: Great French press coffee and the staff is really working hard.

Positive.26: The restaurant is very bright and inviting.

Positive.3: I really enjoyed the avocado toast and side of bacon.
